ygData.subject: RE: Maestro Screenshots
ygData.msgSnippet: the person that took the shot, Jeriel, is a mage in my guild.  that is the Maestro that dropped my six note blade.  Kelothos, the bard in the group that took
ygData.messageBody:
the person that took the shot, Jeriel, is a mage in my guild. that is the
Maestro that dropped my six note blade. Kelothos, the bard in the group
that took the shot, got the lute. you can see me to the left of Maestro
behind a player in wolf-form =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> Today's EQVault Daily Screenshot is Maestro of Rancor..
> Check it out at http://www.eqvault.com/features/dailyshot/ If
> you see that past Sunday - you'll have to select the date (11-27-99)
>
> Slyde
